data.meta_description: Brooke Bailey's husband, basketball player and coach Jason A. Maxiell, is a retired professional basketball player who played 13 seasons in the National Basketball Association (NBA). Maxiell was born in Chicago, Illinois, and played college basketball for the University of Cincinnati before being drafted 20th overall by the Detroit Pistons in the 2005 NBA draft.
data.text:
Brooke Bailey's husband, basketball player and coach Jason A. Maxiell, is a retired professional basketball player who played 13 seasons in the National Basketball Association (NBA). Maxiell was born in Chicago, Illinois, and played college basketball for the University of Cincinnati before being drafted 20th overall by the Detroit Pistons in the 2005 NBA draft. He played for the Pistons, Orlando Magic, Charlotte Bobcats, and Dallas Mavericks over the course of his career, averaging 5.5 points and 4.8 rebounds per game. After retiring from playing, Maxiell became an assistant coach for the Cleveland Cavaliers and is currently an assistant coach for the Miami Heat.

Maxiell and Bailey were married in 2014 and have two children together. Bailey is a reality television personality, actress, and entrepreneur who is best known for her appearances on the VH1 reality series Basketball Wives.

Maxiell's success as a basketball player and Bailey's success as a reality television personality and entrepreneur have made them one of the most recognizable couples in the entertainment industry.
